clearExpiredLocks(address).details: Clear old locked points entries (maintenance) Only callable by owner, helps with storage optimization

getChallengeParticipants(uint256).details: Get challenge participants who had points locked

getTotalLockedPoints(address).details: Get total locked points for a user

getUserLockedPoints(address).details: Get locked points entries for a user

lockPoints(address,uint256,uint256,strin.details: Lock points as stakes for a challenge Called by ChallengeFactory when user joins challenge

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

releasePoints(address,uint256,uint256).details: Release locked points back to user (on loss)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setChallengeFactory(address).details: Update ChallengeFactory address (in case of upgrade)

transferLockedPoints(address,address,uin.details: Transfer locked points from loser to winner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
